DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosis asthma least 6 month ( per American Thoracic Society [ ATS ] definition ) . Best forced expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) 55 % 80 % predict normal . More 12 % FEV1 reversibility follow inhalation salbutamol . Must also symptomatic shortacting betaagonists . Must use inhaled corticosteroid previous month LTRAs ( Leukotriene antagonist ) previous 2 week . Exclusion criterion : Hospital admission asthma within 3 month prior Visit 1 . Sinus , middle ear , oropharyngeal , upper low respiratory tract infection within two week immediately precede Screening Visit 1 . Oral parenteral steroid therapy last 12 week , 3 course last 6 month .
